buyTradingPosition(uint256,address).custom:security: Buyers must have sufficient funds to complete the purchase

params._price: Price to pay for the position

listingTradingPosition(address,uint256,s.custom:security: Only authorized users should be able to list positions
listingTradingPosition(address,uint256,s.details: Lists a trading position for a token

params._token: Address of the token to list

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,u.custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function

params._token: Address of the token used for repayment

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.custom:security: Users must have sufficient balance of the input token

params.amountIn: Amount of input tokens to swap

params._tokenInPrice: Address of the input token price feed
params._tokenOutPrice: Address of the output token price feed

tokenLists(uint256).details: Returns the token address at a specific index

params._index: The index in the token list

returns._0: The address of the token at the specified index

tokenListsId(address).details: Returns the ID of a token in the token list

returns._0: The ID of the token in the list

tokenValue(address).details: Gets the value of a token

withdrawCollateral(uint256,address,bool).custom:security: Users can only withdraw their own collateral

params._user: Address of the user withdrawing collateral

buyTradingPosition(uint256,address).notice: This function allows users to purchase trading positions

counter().notice: This function tracks the number of positions or operations

listingTradingPosition(address,uint256,s.notice: This function creates a new trading position listing

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address,u.notice: This function allows users to repay their debt

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.notice: This function allows users to swap tokens within their position

tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,.notice: This function performs price-based token calculations

tokenValue(address).notice: This function returns the current value of a token

withdrawCollateral(uint256,address,bool).notice: This function allows users to withdraw their collateral
